item.title: pkgdown.offline: Build pkgdown websites without an internet connection
item.description: On the grid but off the line. Logo font: Founders Grotesk Condensed Semibold. I’m pleased to announce that the R package pkgdown.offline is now available on CRAN. You can install it with: install.packages("pkgdown.offline") pkgdown.offline enables you to build pkgdown websites in environments without internet access, such as private, restricted development workflows or CI/CD pipelines. It achieves this by bundling the essential frontend assets (CSS, JavaScript) that pkgdown typically fetches online and by providing alternative implementations for key pkgdown functions like init_site() and build_site().
